item.description:
BBQ Details

Please bring a bottle of Malbec from either Argentina, Chile, Cahors France or ???. I'll select and bag 6 bottles to evaluate for your fun and pleasure.

Please update your RSVP if you haven't already.

The BBQ meats, Pulled Chicken and Pulled Pork, will be $10/person.

Appetizers & wine starts at 6:30.

 

These are current contributions:

Diane-  Roasted veggies

Carrie, Eleanor - Potato salad

Jane  -  Veggie salad 
Coleslaw - Monica

Kim,  Noelle, Monica, Michelle- Dessert

Noel& Shawna - Corn salad

Joan - hummus and pita bread

Joe - Pasta salad

Ellen - Orzo

Darci - Cheese, tapenade spread & crackers

 

Could always use extra of similar items since we expect about 25 people.

Please send me an email to minimize duplicates.

List of other food items needed...

Appetizers

Salsa & chips

bruchetta or crostini (grilled bread with toppings

 

Salads

Pasta

Fruit

Assorted veggie tray

Speciality salads like tabouleh, bean

 

This is open to all three groups. So please only RSVP to one group.

Appetizers start at 6:30pm.

 

Thanks,

Mike
item.name: BBQ and Malbec
